title: Journey Into Danger (1R253)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Search. To play, exert a [Sauron] Orc. Plays to your support area. While you can spot 5 companions, each companion's twilight cost is +2.
Lore:	”'I do not foretell, for all foretelling is now vain: on the one hand lies darkness, on the other only hope.'”
Rarity:	R
